item.title: The Wild Robot's Biggest Book Changes Made DreamWorks' $334 Million Movie So Much Better
item.description: The Wild Robot is adapted from Peter Brown's trilogy of books, but several changes were made to the source material, which improved the movie.

item.title: 10 Times Hulk Stole The Scene In The MCU
item.description: The Hulk has changed a lot throughout the Marvel Cinematic Universe. However, despite his evolution, he always manages to steal the scene.

item.title: Scream 7's Timeline & Location Addressed By Franchise Writer
item.description: Scream 7 is slated for release next year, and now franchise writer Guy Busick speaks on where and when the sequel film might take place.
